page.title: 04THE BAKERY, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: On Akeferry Road there is a {bakery. The owners of the{bakery}used to live in Doncaster. The baker and his wife came to Westwoodside after he retired from being a chef. They saw an old{bakery for sale, and restored it. They still use the old dough mixer, which is a machine for mixing dough, and they also use the old oven. They do not use chemicals and additives in their food. All their food is baked on the premises. They find the hardest thing to make is a hovis loaf. They catered for the Royal Yacht staff in 1963. Most people in the south east of the village use the bakery.
